alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 8:15PM EST until January 12 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 900 PM EST. * At 815 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Chattahoochee, or 10 miles northwest of Quincy, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Havana, Whigham, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Attapulgus, Darsey, Rosedale, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Recovery, Laingkat, Calvary, Jinks, Princes Still, Amsterdam, Branchville, Nickleville, Hinson and Dogtown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for the Panhandle of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for the Panhandle of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
